author: Reuters
title: Stocks tumble again as Morgan Stanley sees U.S. economic growth plunging to 74-year low on coronavirus crisis
description: With so much uncertainty about when any semblance of normality might return there are few places to really hide
content:
LONDON/SYDNEY/HONG KONG — Financial markets around the world took another hammering on Monday as a rising tide of national coronavirus lockdowns threatened to overwhelm policymakers’ frantic efforts to cushion what is likely to be a deep global recession.
